desc: CARPASUS is the Swiss brand for sustainable shirts for men. From dress shirts to casual shirts, Linen Shirts and Flannel Shirts. Made from organic cotton and organic linen by Europe's best weavers and manufacturers. Fair Fashion for style- and eco-conscious men.

layout.text: High-quality, timeless menswear, made in Europe from organically grown materials such as organic cotton and organic linen. For style- and eco-conscious men.
